alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 4:01AM CDT until April 01 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CULLMAN COUNTY... At 400 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holly Pond, or 9 miles north of Blountsville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Hanceville, Good Hope, Holly Pond, Dodge City, Baileyton, Garden City, Phelan, Walter and Bremen. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central, northeastern and northwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
